document_data.name: Squallocks
document_data.mainbody: '''Squallocks''' was a [[vrock]] advisor of the [[demon lord]] [[Graz'zt]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/Assault on Maerimydra|46}}
document_data.History: ''Circa'' [[1486 DR]], Squallocks was at the [[Undying Temple]] in [[Maerimydra]] assisting Graz'zt and the queen of Maerimydra [[Hledh Hellspawn]] in the ritual to permit Graz'zt to resist [[Vizeran DeVir]]'s [[spell]].
